searchTermPath.title: Search Term Path
searchTermPath.description: Indicate the search path of your store

enableOrderFormOptimization.title: orderForm optimization
enableOrderFormOptimization.description: Disables the legacy orderForm provider. More at: https://vtex.io/docs/recipes/store-management/enabling-order-form-optimization.

enableServiceWorker.title: Service Worker
enableServiceWorker.description: Register the default Service Worker provided by VTEX.

enableCriticalCSS.title: Critical CSS Optimization
enableCriticalCSS.description: Enables CSS optimizations that can improve performance and the Lighthouse score. Only affects the home page. May cause style inconsistencies, test with caution after turning it on.

enableCriticalCSSOnSearch.title: Critical CSS Optimization on Search Page
enableCriticalCSSOnSearch.description: Enables CSS optimizations that can improve performance and the Lighthouse score. Only affects the search page. May cause style inconsistencies, test with caution after turning it on.

enableCriticalCSSOnCustom.title: Critical CSS Optimization on Custom Page
enableCriticalCSSOnCustom.description: Enables CSS optimizations that can improve performance and the Lighthouse score. Only affects custom pages. May cause style inconsistencies, test with caution after turning it on.

enableCriticalCSSOnProduct.title: Critical CSS Optimization on Product Page
enableCriticalCSSOnProduct.description: Enables CSS optimizations that can improve performance and the Lighthouse score. Only affects product pages. May cause style inconsistencies, test with caution after turning it on.

enableCSSConcatenation.title: Enable CSS Concatenation
enableCSSConcatenation.description: Concatenates a page's CSS in a single file for faster download.

enablePrefetch.title: Enable Prefetch
enablePrefetch.description: Prefetches pages on mouse hover for faster navigation.

enableMenuRenderingOptimization.title: Enable lazy rendering of submenu items
enableMenuRenderingOptimization.description: Enables optimized submenu rendering, which improves performance. May cause style issues, test with caution after turning it on.

enableSearchRenderingOptimization.title: Enable lazy rendering of search results and facets
enableSearchRenderingOptimization.description: Enables optimized rendering of search results and facets, which improves performance. May cause style issues, test with caution after turning it on.

enableAsyncScripts.title: Enable loading scripts asynchronously
enableAsyncScripts.description: Start processing scripts sooner by asynchronously loading and executing them.

enableConcurrentMode.title: Enable React Concurrent Mode
enableConcurrentMode.description: Help the store to stay responsive and adjust to the userâ€™s device capabilities and network speed.

enableFiltersFetchOptimization.title: Enable fetching filters partially
enableFiltersFetchOptimization.description: Improves search pages' performance by fetching only the 10 first facets of every filter, adding a button to show the rest. May cause issues when going to a page with facets selected, especially on search-resolver v0. Test with caution after turning it on

enableFullSSROnProduct.title: Enable executing all GraphQL queries on the product page
enableFullSSROnProduct.description: It helps when a product page needs to fetch extra data to render components above the fold. Just turn it on if your product page really needs it, otherwise it will be a deoptimization.

enableLazyFooter.title: Enable lazy rendering of the page footer
enableLazyFooter.description: Lazily render the page footer and lazily loads its assets, which helps improving the performance of the first render of the page.

enableLazyFold.title: Enable lazy loading of assets below-the-fold
enableLazyFold.description: Enables lazy loading of the JS files of the components below the `__fold__` block.
